#KRIG
Computes simple, ordinary and universal Kriging, also computes simple, ordinary and universal 
co-Kriging. In addition, includes functions for Sensitivity analysis based in the approximation, 
inside Reproducing Kernel Hilbert spaces, of Sobol indices.
